flavor: Waiting is useless. The crisis is here; pick a side.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
title: Esâ Afontov: Eco-Insurrectionist

flavor:
We're all alike down here
Androids are friends we salute
Give us all a f***ing break
Ol' Jack is the s*** on my boot.
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, sabotage 4. (The Corp trashes 4 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, sabotage 4. (The Corp trashes 4 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
title: Chastushka

flavor: We can change the world, if we're willing to be changed in return.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage. Gain clickclickclick.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage.
Gain [click][click][click].
title: Running Hot

flavor: Reactive implants reclaim the memories of our fallen comrades. Their sacrifice is our shield.
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards. When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may draw 2 cards.
text:
Draw 3 cards.
When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may draw 2 cards.
title: Steelskin Scarring

stripped_text: +1mu You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.
title: Marrow

flavor: "Sometimes being a union rep calls for action even more... direct."
stripped_text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
title: Avgustina Ivanovskaya

flavor: A single spark is all that it takes to destroy billions of credits... or to burn away the rot that ravages our world.
stripped_text: click, trash, suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
text: [click], [trash], suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
title: Light the Fire!

flavor: Flaws hold both beauty and opportunity.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain click.
text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain [click].
title: Nyusha "Sable" Sintashta: Symphonic Prodigy

stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
title: Pinhole Threading

stripped_text: +1mu When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, if that server is HQ, access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Otherwise, breach HQ when the run ends. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, if that server is HQ, access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Otherwise, breach HQ when the run ends. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Virtuoso

flavor: The feel of flour-fine coffee, the scent of caramelizing sugar, the gentle heat of the flame. A ritual I never forget.
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.
text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.
title: Cezve

flavor: "Aim with your eye. Shoot with your mind. Break with your soul." –Sundog
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface -> trash or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface → [trash] or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
title: Revolver

flavor: The sea is everything; its breath must remain pure and healthy.
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
title: Captain Padma Isbister: Intrepid Explorer

stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend click to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn.
The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend [click] to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
title: Deep Dive

flavor: Edie doesn't mind the noise. She's happy just being nearby.
stripped_text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3 credits less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3[credit] less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
title: Rigging Up

stripped_text: +2mu When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Endurance

stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.
text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Hákarl 1.0

flavor: Ethereal beauty laced with the most elegant venom.
